data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_P04qLO10rEQ7kNvgERWuQQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDLTdsp3gQNG6S7HULUYoFB4d9XFRqAr_42tCWABSw1jw&oe=66619E1C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GUPN-xsejzwQ7kNvgGsMMWr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBUV5OhiJsT7jM_Ml97-XD5Agdgfqn5DbjoIGwnbNTZvw&oe=6661A7A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8tAT41cOnzwQ7kNvgEZdnMC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDmhpvl8jVL646PXfFGP4fCEpQL7XVzIesYEI5eWOeyFQ&oe=66618F07)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Cy4L6jYX-dMQ7kNvgEuMW_a&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBIekSpPHvx5QwLembt_pDzocqciJHiuWb6zgRrpNh_hQ&oe=666181E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=jEhI8law87QQ7kNvgHOUlJ4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB1GfymrfSKYGW0C_aiilGoEqK7MJfedtAsLwJrqrlOAQ&oe=6661AE58)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NqscGA-8eOkQ7kNvgFP-4cC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD6_xMXIaTDLpQtJmzgZsTGq7E0HQ2oK-6A2-1AWOigfw&oe=6661AAD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=j4Rx1aVq7WgQ7kNvgFwdzvL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAWY0NIVYAS3j23stQXaYg3LsjOIqkpY2ge_6zIhZ8HKw&oe=666190F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=MoSp5abvUccQ7kNvgF2GV_9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYATIK_wZfSH1wxA8isO2c5Lp6QQ8e5ZOsQtA1bNTyfHzA&oe=66617B6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sLEOrF-izqYQ7kNvgFXu1Pe&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB70VMRJaGxJw_TOwS0kltv8QOZNL4IkPoHQxq_lrwfmg&oe=66618F17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QSQrAO2qcr4Q7kNvgFbhwzF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC4SJx7SmrtPShUY5BbpeWCObn6r7uY3-d6Evd9ad3xBQ&oe=6661AA8C)
